definition: bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw

sentences.english: Once fastening bolts, each bolt to ensure that the force evenly.
sentences.chinese: 一旦开始紧固螺栓，要确保各个螺栓均匀受力。

sentences.english: Once fastening bolts, each bolt to ensure that the force evenly.
sentences.chinese: 一旦开始紧固螺栓，要确保各个螺栓均匀受力。

sentences.english: The fracture of the tie bolts of the D39 main engine has been analysed briefly.
sentences.chinese: 对D39主机底脚螺栓断裂事故进行了简略的分析。

sentences.english: Remove 3 bolts holding headlamp in place.
sentences.chinese: 删除3螺栓控股头灯在的地方。

sentences.english: Remove the upper suspension arm nut and bolt at the axle bracket.
sentences.chinese: 从车轴支架上拆去上端悬吊臂螺帽和螺栓。

sentences.english: Remove bolts holding shift lever to transmission.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸将排挡杆固定到变速箱的螺栓。

sentences.english: Terry Allen burning off bolts on drawbar center casting.
sentences.chinese: 特里艾伦烧制螺栓在拉杆上中心铸造。

sentences.english: The new box could be epoxied or screw attached into place.
sentences.chinese: 该新盒可以用用环氧树脂粘合或螺栓连接到位。

sentences.english: Place the new pump in position and tighten mounting bolts.
sentences.chinese: 使水泵就位，拧紧装配螺栓。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, we can also produce non-standard bolts.
sentences.chinese: 同时生产各种非标准件螺栓。

sentences.english: Templates and foundation bolting shall be shipped separately from the vessels according to Purchaser's instruction.
sentences.chinese: 样板及地脚螺栓应根据买方指导同容器分开运输。

sentences.english: The cylinder head is attached to the block with high-tensile steel studs.
sentences.chinese: 气缸盖与气缸体用高强度的钢螺栓缚连结。

sentences.english: Threaded holes and studs shall be in good condition and not damaged or worn in any way.
sentences.chinese: 有螺纹的孔和螺栓应完好，并无任何毁坏或磨损。

sentences.english: Bolted end-plate connection is a kind of field joint frequently used in steel frame construction.
sentences.chinese: 螺栓端板连接是钢结构中常用的一种安装连接。

sentences.english: Suspension type thumb nut is used for fastening so that it can be quickly opened up sand downward is conventient for maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 采用碟型活节螺栓紧固，能快速向下开启，便于维修。

sentences.english: Remove the upper flywheel and converter housing bolts and loosen the bottom bolts.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸上部飞轮及转换器外壳螺栓，拧松底部螺栓。

definition: nut (female component of nut and bolt)
